Hi [redacted_email],
Thank you for being part of the Astroline community. As requested, your subscription was successfully canceled on October 31, 2024 and you will no longer be charged.
We appreciate your time and support and would like to express our gratitude by offering you a special gift ğŸ Enjoy premium content at a super-low price! ğŸ”¥To accept the offer, please follow the link.
Any questions remain unanswered? Please contact us at astroline.app@support-team.app
Contact us
Remember to check your mobile app for any active subscriptions.
Best regards,
Your Astroline
